notes.title: Authors’ contributions
notes.p: Conceptual framework: NT, DS, BP, SO. Plant material collection, identification and extraction: NT, DS, EG, BP. Cell culturing experiments, data curation, and formal analysis: NT, SO. Methodology: NT, DS, EG, BP, SO. Supervision: DS, EG, BP, SO. Writing – original draft: NT, SO. Writing – review & editing: NT, DS, EG, BP, SO. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.
